close-stream.cant-topup-message: You cannot top up a stream from a locked treasury
close-stream.context-beneficiary: Closing a stream will send the vested amount to your account ({{beneficiary}}) and stop the flow of money immediately.
close-stream.context-treasurer-multiple-beneficiaries: Al concluir esta transferencia monetaria se detendrá el flujo de dinero inmediatamente, se enviará los fondos adquiridos al beneficiario({{beneficiary}}), y se retornará los fondos pendientes a la cuenta ({{treasury}}) original.
close-stream.context-treasurer-single-beneficiary: Al concluir esta transferencia monetaria se detendrá el flujo de dinero inmediatamente, se enviará los fondos adquiridos al beneficiario ({{beneficiary}}), y se retornará los fondos pendientes al contribuidor original.

donation-fund.description: Cree una cuenta donde cualquiera pueda donar con la tranquilidad que los fondos se utilizarán para la causa correcta.
donation-fund.name: Fondo de Donación

fundraising.description: ¿Desea recaudar fondos para su Seed, Series, ICO, DAICO, Private Rounds? No busque más, su mejor opción es el Contrato de Recaudación de Fondos.
fundraising.name: Recaudación de fondos

otp.description: Envíe dinero o programe un pago a otra persona solo una vez. Utilice esta opción para pagar lo que quiera.
otp.name: Enviar Pago

payroll.description: Configure la nómina para un empleado o contratista, en cualquier parte del mundo sin los gastos generales de los servicios bancarios tradicionales.
payroll.name: Nómina de pagos

pension-fund.description: Para empleadores que establecen planes de pensión que pagan a los empleados sobre eventos que califiquen, como alcanzar la edad de jubilación.
pension-fund.name: Fondo de pensiones

real-estate-sale-escrow.description: Configure la cuenta de depósito en garantía para una transacción de bienes raíces. El vendedor y el comprador obtienen acceso directo y auditoría completa de forma gratuita.
real-estate-sale-escrow.name: Venta de bienes raíces (fideicomiso)

rent-collection.description: Configure el cobro de alquiler para sus inquilinos. Reciba pagos en tiempo real por cada minuto que ocupen su propiedad.
rent-collection.name: Pago de alquiler

repeating.description: Envíe dinero a cualquier persona con un flujo de dinero fijo a lo largo del tiempo. Ideal para retribuciones familiares, asignaciones por hijos y más.
repeating.name: Pago Recurrente

setup-everything.description: Recomendado para profesionales que desean establecer un contrato con términos únicos, no de uso común.
setup-everything.name: Configurar todo (avanzado)

subscription.description: Configure un contrato de suscripción SaaS para pagos regulares de membresía. Piense en Netflix o en su membresía mensual de Gym Club.
subscription.name: Suscripción

custody.heading: Crypto Asset Custody
custody.subheading: The most advanced digital asset platform, for secure crypto custody, trading, staking, governance, and more.

first-container.text-one: We provide secure custody solutions for institutions and individuals alike so they can safely invest in crypto assets.
first-container.text-two: With MeanFi Trading, access multiple venues through one onboarding. Borrow crypto or USD against crypto collateral, or lend and earn returns on assets under custody.
first-container.text-three: Dedicated Support Team that guides you during the onboard process and help you resolve any challenge.

second-container.title: WHY MEANFI CUSTODY
second-container.text: We're a team of engineers, designers, and crypto experts who believe that the future is digital assets. However, with no way to securely store them right now we feel like our hands are tied behind our back. So we decided to build MeanFi Custody so that you can finally make your money work for you!

third-container.title: Supported Assets
third-container.text: MeanFi supports assets that meet our standards of quality and safety. Our list includes USDC, USDT, SOL, DAI, and more. We are always looking to grow our portfolio with new Assets. To learn more about our roadmap, please get in touch.

repeating-twice-month.description: Every other week on {{dayOfWeek}}, starting today.

invest.title: Invest
invest.subtitle: The easiest way to grow your money stash

panel-right.title: Stake MEAN to Earn MEAN Rewards
panel-right.first-text: MEAN staking rewards include emission incentives plus a share of the protocol revenues, and can be boosted using locking periods. When you stake your MEAN, you get sMEAN in return.
panel-right.second-text: Simply holding your sMEAN is all that is required to continuously grow your MEAN stash. You don't need to harvest the rewards with MEAN staking. When you unstake your sMEAN, you will receive the rewards earned in the form of additional MEAN on top of the amount staked.

stake.name: Stake
stake.period-label: How long do you want to stake for?
stake.notification-label: Staking period of {{periodValue}} {{periodTime}} will lock your Tokens until {{unstakeStartDate}}.
stake.verified-label: I agree to the Terms & Conditions
stake.terms-and-conditions-tooltip: Your tokens will be locked for the period of time selected and you will not be able to unstake them before the staking period ends. When you stake additional tokens to an existing contract, the staking period will be extended to the new end date for ALL of the tokens locked.

unstake.name: Unstake
unstake.notification-label-one: Your currently have {{unstakeAmount}} MEAN staked which is currently locked until {{unstakeStartDate}}
unstake.notification-label-one-error: You don't have any MEAN staked
unstake.notification-label-two: Unstaking will withdraw the specified amount of unlocked MEAN tokens to your wallet
unstake.verified-label: I agree to the Terms & Conditions

staking-data.text-two: Additional locking boost periods are coming soon! Only 7 days locking is currently available.

market.token-fully_dilluted_market_cap: El valor total de mercado de la oferta circulante de una criptomoneda. Es análogo a la capitalización del capital flotante en el mercado de valores. Capitalización de mercado = Precio actual x suministro circulante

market.token-total-volume: Una medida de cuánto se negoció una criptomoneda en las últimas 24 horas
market.token-total-supply: La cantidad de monedas que ya se han creado, menos las monedas que se han quemado. Es análoga a las acciones en circulación en el mercado de valores
market.token-circulating-suppply: La cantidad de monedas que están circulando en el mercado y están en manos públicas. Es análoga a las acciones que fluyen en el mercado de valores
market.token-total-money-streams: Número total de pagos continuos a lo largo del tiempo que han sido creados por el programa Money Streaming
market.token-total-value-locked: La cantidad de activos que se están apostando actualmente en un protocolo específico

treasury-type-options.treasury-type-locked-description: With a locked treasury you can create streams that act like a vesting contract for reserved allocations, like the ones needed for investors. They usually have a fixed end date.
treasury-type-options.treasury-type-open-description: With an open treasury, you can create money streams that run indefinitely. When the treasury runs out of money all streams stop, until it gets replenished.

treasury-streams.minimum-allocation-advice: You must set a minimum allocation for this Money Stream up to the unallocated balance available in the Treasury.
treasury-streams.multiple-address-question-mark-tooltip:
Please provide a csv text file with one address per line in the following format: 
 MEMO or STREAM NAME, WALLET ADDRESS. 

 Here is an example of how it should look: 
 Epoch 1, FrdFf3EqcGuytTweLvoELBt29WrAGVYjrh4585A2bTAZ 

 Before you submit the file, please make sure the recipient addresses are correct and do not belong to an exchange.
treasury-streams.message-warning: The list of recipients you submitted included your own wallet address. This is not possible and this address has been removed from the imported list.
treasury-streams.no-streams: This treasury has no active streams
